title: Assess Risk of Supply Chain Delay
description: A project manager identifies a potential supply chain delay for custom windows and must assess the impact.

tasks.description: Identify the project tasks dependent on the delivery of the custom windows.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists 'Window Installation' and 'Interior Drywall' as dependent tasks.

tasks.description: Log the supply chain issue in the project's risk register, classifying it as 'High Impact, Medium Probability'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new entry is created in the risk register with the correct details.

tasks.description: Develop a mitigation plan, such as identifying an alternative supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proposes a viable mitigation strategy.
